name: Deep Sea Hell
description:
Save a loved one in this aquatic bullet hell adventure. Explore a semi-open world and gain upgrades to become stronger!

USE WASD TO MOVE

LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT

RIGHT CLICK TO BOMB

SHIFT TO DASH

Devnote*

It has been my dream to make video games since I was a kid. Now I can say I've accomplished that. This is the first full game I've ever completed (not including game jams).  I started working one month ago and set a goal for myself to have it completed in a month. There were many instances where I had to go with 'good enough' because of time constraints. Still, I made the game in entirety and I'm proud.

Please leave your feedback and constructive criticism.
